item.description:
After some great sessions at Greg's place, we thought it might be fun to try a new venue for a slight change of pace and to give Greg a break.

This is a great venue for listeners and players. As I understand it, this is a hosted jam; therefore, no gear required other than your horn or axe. I've never paid attention to how drummers do jams; I would imagine you'd need sticks. There is a $5 cover charge here.

I am looking forward to seeing people in this group I've met before and those of you who haven't yet come out.

I realize this is short notice, and I apologize for that. Next meetup will be scheduled further in advance.

Hope to see as many of you there as possible!

Ed
item.how_to_find_us: Tall, half-japanese. You can call me @ 781-325-6084
item.name: Acton Jazz Cafe - Sunday Jam, 4-7pm
